title: Haven't received free event items.
body: During the last couple of events, (the anniversary and star guardian) Riot has released special free items for doing specific thing, (playing a couple games or taking the star guardian quiz). Now I both played many games during the anniversary event and took the star guardian quiz several times (I got jinx BTW) and NEVER received my Riot Kayle skin nor my Star Guardian Icon (It's been over a week since I first did the quiz.) and it's really making me upset. Please help.{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
I took a look at your account and it looks like you received Riot Kayle towards the beginning of the gifting waves. Regarding the Star Guardian quiz, it was actually launched 6 days ago, so if you don't have anything in 2 days, let me know since they shouldn't take longer than a week to go out.

Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=MZJJyncv,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-13T01:15:46.420+0000)
>
> I took a look at your account and it looks like you received Riot Kayle towards the beginning of the gifting waves. Regarding the Star Guardian quiz, it was actually launched 6 days ago, so if you don't have anything in 2 days, let me know since they shouldn't take longer than a week to go out.
> 
> Let me know if you have any questions.

Yeah, looks like I did have Riot Kayle, it never gave me the Gift Box animation for it, so I didn't think I recieved it, and I just got the icon today. Thanks for the assistance{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
